definitions.definition: The construction or maintenance done to roads .
examples: The traffic jam was caused by roadwork being done during rush hour.

definitions.definition: Exercise such as running and jogging done on the roads.
examples: The athlete needed to get home early to do his roadwork before it got too dark to be safe.

definitions.definition: The taking of a band on the road to perform music in different locations.

main_definition: The construction or maintenance done to roads .
secondary_definitions: Exercise such as running and jogging done on the roads.
The taking of a band on the road to perform music in different locations.
